Text: @hashishi, I use TvVersity for files that need to be transferred to the PS3 (files over 4gb), but regardless, if Cinivia is there, transferring over the internet doesn't help. The Boxee Box is just another transferring device and if I had 170$ to spend on that, I would just buy the movie. Lol.. I already have to pay 120 dollars for freakin internet since I live in the country, so that's why I cut corners. No offense though.
